Easily expandable and with remarkable performance, the Aspire TC Series is the perfect partner when it comes to demanding tasks like video editing and compiling photo albums. It has a 30.4-megapixel full-frame CMOS sensor and a 100-32,000 ISO range that lets you take large photos that are sharp and bright. The Canon EOS 5D Mark IV body is ideal for shooting action photos with speeds of up to seven frames per second.

products.name: Canon - EOS 5D Mark IV DSLR Camera with 24-105mm f/4L IS II USM Lens - Black
products.description: Shoot beautiful images in almost any lighting with this Canon EOS 5D camera. Its 30.4-megapixel full-frame sensor captures vivid detail for beautiful travel and event montages. Its 4K motion JPEG video capability helps you preserve precious moments, while its increased responsiveness provides smooth recording. The built-in GPS on this Canon EOS 5D camera helps you geotag photos.   .

products.name: Canon - EOS 6D Mark II DSLR Video Camera (Body Only) - Black
products.description: Expand your photography skills with this powerful Canon EOS 6D Mark II camera body. Enhanced with a large 26.2MP CMOS sensor and a DIGIC 7 image processor, this DSLR unit captures true-to-life color and compelling detail. The 45-point all-cross AF system in this Canon EOS 6D Mark II camera body helps you produce crisp, clear images in any light.

products.name: Canon - EOS 6D Mark II DSLR Video Camera with EF 24-105mm f/4L IS II USM Lens - Black

The compact DSLR camera gives you all the function of a full-frame device in a much smaller size, and the included EF 24-105 lens offers sharp zooming. This Canon EOS camera shoots video in full HD, making it an ideal option for vloggers.  .

products.name: 3M - Peltor Sport Tactical 500 Electronic Hearing Protector - Black
products.description: Targeted NRR of 26 dB for passive sound protection. Suppresses gunshot noise and amplifies low sounds using proprietary 3M technologies. Dynamic Suppression Time measures the energy in gunshot noise and automatically sets suppression time for reduced echoes and increased comfort. Clear Voice Tracking Technology seeks voice amongst the noise to improve speech intelligibility and situational awareness. Bluetooth Wireless Technology to seamlessly sync to mobile devices. Make and receive phone calls through the headset. Engineered for optimal fit and comfort. Foldable and adjustable.

products.name: 3M - WorkTunes AM/FM Hearing Protector - Black/Yellow
products.description: Infuse more fun into your workday with 3M WorkTunes Hearing Protector with AM/FM Radio. Designed to bring you hearing protection and entertainment, these protective earmuffs let you listen to the music of your choice from the AM/FM radio or from your mobile device via the auxiliary jack. Built in comfort features like plush ear cushions and a padded headband help keep you comfortable while on the job. Plus, Voice Assist Technology lets you know which radio station you're on without having to remove the headset. So whether you're cutting grass or hard at work in the woodshop, help protect your hearing–and have a great time while you're at it–with 3M WorkTunes Hearing Protector with AM/FM Radio. Noise Reduction Rating (NRR) 24dB.

products.name: 3M - WorkTunes Connect Wireless Hearing Protector with Bluetooth Technology - Black/Yellow
products.description: 3M WorkTunes Connect Hearing Protector with Bluetooth Wireless Technology combines a modern, comfortable design with high-fidelity sound quality. This innovative hearing protection lets you conveniently make and take phone calls. Equipped with Bluetooth Wireless Technology, these hearing protection headphones allow you to stream the entertainment of your choice from your smartphone or other mobile device, while providing hearing protection in noisy environments. The low-profile and lightweight design is crafted with style in mind. Built-in comfort features such as soft ear cushions and a hat-compatible headband are excellent for extended wear. Whether you're using a power saw or mowing the day away, reach for 3M WorkTunes Connect Hearing Protector with Bluetooth Wireless Technology to help make your workday entertaining and–most importantly–comfortable.

products.name: adidas - RPT-02 SOL Self-charging headphone - Night Grey/Solar Yellow
products.description: The self-charging adidas RPT-02 SOL headphones are built in part from recycled plastics* and are designed to endure the everyday challenges of an active lifestyle. Using light as the ultimate source of energy, you're offered all the playtime you need to keep the music going. Taking time to recharge or gearing up for a workout, these sport headphones are powered by light to power your performance.*51% of the product consists of plastic of which 87% is post consumer recycled PC-ABS and recycled nylon (excluding plastics in electronic components)

products.name: adidas - Z.N.E. 01 ANC - Light Grey
products.description: adidas Z.N.E. 01 ANC gives you immersive sound to connect to the moment.  They're built to move, from the sleek ergonomics to the carefully considered style.  The versatile design will become a staple in any outfit from your workout to daily life.  Active Noise Canceling blocks out distractions, so you keep your mind focused on what's next.

products.name: 10" Wireless Bass Pro Subwoofer for Streambar, Streambar Pro, and Roku Wireless Speakers - Black
products.description: Transform the sound of your entertainment with our best subwoofer in Roku Wireless Bass Pro. Movies and music come to life with 250 watts of heart-pounding bass, bringing a cinematic experience to your living room. You’ll hear—and feel—the impact of a powerful 10” driver amping up the bass of everything on your screen, from the roar of the big game to a room-shaking drum solo. And like all Roku Audio products, this subwoofer is easy to use and simple to set up. Just power up and wirelessly pair whenever you’re ready to go all in on upgrading your home theater.

products.name: 3 Pack Turntable Replacement Needles for Victrola Record Players - Red
products.description: Victrola 3 pack turntable replacement needles for Victrola VTA-65, VTA-67, VTA-204B, VSC-580BT record players. These high quality ceraming needles will work with all vinyl record sizes (33 1/3, 45, or 78 RPM) and intallation is simple and effortless.

products.name: Alpine - 6-1/2” 2-Way Weather-Resistant Coaxial Speaker Pods (Pair) - Black
products.description: Now you can get Alpine sound on a variety of powersport and all-terrain vehicles for an uninterrupted music experience that goes beyond the vehicle.

products.name: Amazon - Echo Sub 100W Subwoofer - Charcoal
products.description: Echo Sub delivers down-firing, 100W deep bass sound through a 6" woofer. Pair with one Echo device to enjoy dynamic music that fills the room. Pair with two of the same Echo devices for rich left/right stereo sound. Simple to set up and use—just plug in, open the Alexa app, and wirelessly connect to your Echo device(s) to control music with your voice. We want you to know - Echo Sub must be paired with a compatible Echo device. Echo Sub is optimized for Echo Studio, Echo Dot 4th Gen, Echo Dot 3rd Gen, Echo 4th Gen, Echo 3rd Gen, Echo 2nd Gen, Echo Show 10 3rd Gen, and Echo Plus 2nd Gen. Currently, stereo pairing, speaker groups, and multi-room music only support music playback over your wireless network, and do not support Bluetooth, 3.5mm AUX in, or TV/video connections. Some Echo devices support different stereo and subwoofer configurations.

products.name: Accell - Power Wall Charger with Holder for Amazon Echo Dot 3rd Gen and 2 USB-A Charging Ports - Black
products.description: Have an Amazon Echo Dot 3? A passthrough wall charger with Echo Dot (3rd Gen) Holder and 2 USB Type A charging ports, the Accell Power Wall Charger in Black allows you to easily mount your Amazon Echo Dot 3rd Generation onto any standard wall outlet without blocking the other outlets. The holder secures the hub itself and provides a clean and neat cable management design around the holder.

products.name: AcuRite - Alarm Clock with Weather Station and USB Charging - White/Black
products.description: Wake up with a charged phone and all the weather information you need to start your day! This AcuRite weather forecaster features an alarm clock with snooze and provides hyperlocal weather conditions and a personal forecast. The handy USB port allows you to plug in your phone or other device.

products.name: AcuRite - Atlas Weather Station - White/Black
products.description: This AcuRite professional home weather station features a 7-in-1 wireless outdoor sensor and a high-definition white indoor display. Optimize your home or office while keeping tabs on your hyperlocal weather conditions. This weather station comes with a one-year limited warranty.

products.name: AcuRite - Digital Fridge and Freezer Thermometer - White
products.description: The AcuRite digital fridge and freezer thermometer provides internal temperature measurements on one easy-to-read display. Two separate remote sensors wirelessly relay temperature information to the display, which also provides historical high and low temperatures and a programmable alarm. Whether used in the kitchen or as a chest freezer thermometer, keep your food supply safe with this AcuRite digital thermometer. This wireless fridge and freezer thermometer comes with a one-year limited warranty.

products.name: AcuRite - Digital Weather Forecaster with Indoor/Outdoor Temperature and Indoor Humidity - White/Black
products.description: Optimize your home with this AcuRite digital weather forecaster! The color display provides hyperlocal weather information, including a personalized forecast, outdoor temperature with high and low records (that reset at midnight), and barometric pressure. The included outdoor wireless sensor combines elevation with barometric pressure measurements to provide a weather forecast 12 hours from current conditions specific to your exact location. The in-home weather station display also provides the indoor temperature, indoor humidity with a comfort meter, today’s date, and the current time. The backlit LCD screen can be set to 100%, 60%, or 15% brightness or to the auto-dim mode, which dims the screen to 15% from 9:01 p.m. to 5:59 a.m. Stay on top of your hyperlocal weather outside and environmental comfort conditions inside with this AcuRite digital weather forecaster.  The display uses an included 5V power adapter and takes three (3) AAA batteries (not included) for optional battery backup. The outdoor sensor wirelessly transmits data over a 433 MHz frequency from up to 165 feet away (depending on home  construction materials) and requires two (2) AA batteries (not included).

products.name: Alpine - Turn1™  Waterproof Bluetooth® Speaker & Bracket - Black
products.description: The Alpine Turn1™ is ready for outdoor adventure! It is completely waterproof - bring it outside to the pool, to the bonfire, anywhere you want big sound. Even in open-air with wind or other noise, your music still comes through clear. The built-in battery supports 12+ hours of playtime, and the included carry strap allows you to take your music with you where ever you go! The AD-SPK1PRO also includes a universal mounting bracket to attach it to your Jeep® Wrangler or Side x Side roll bars for even more adventure options!

products.name: Alpine - Turn1™ Portable Waterproof Bluetooth® Speaker - Black
products.description: The Alpine Turn1™ is ready for outdoor adventure! It is completely waterproof - bring it outside to the pool, to the bonfire, anywhere you want big sound. products.name: Altec Lansing - HydraBlast Everything Proof Speaker - Black
products.description: The HydraBlast Everything Proof speaker is the perfect party companion. With up to 20 hours of battery life plus built-in LED light modes, the party atmosphere and music will be hard to top! Qi Wireless charging keeps not only your phone but the party alive, simply drop a Qi-compatible device atop the speaker and watch it charge! Don't have a phone with wireless charging - the HydraBlast comes equipped with a USB smartphone charger for added functionality. With an IP67 Everything Proof (waterproof, snowproof, and dirtproof) rating + Antimicrobial protection (repels 99.9% of bacteria), nothing can stop the HydraBlast. Pair two HydraBlast's together for that surround sound excitement. The party just got better with Altec Lansing!

products.name: Altec Lansing - HydraJolt Everything Proof Speaker - Black
products.description: The HydraJolt Everything Proof Speaker is a powerful, portable wireless speaker. It is waterproof, dustproof, shockproof and it floats in water with it's IP67 Everything Proof rating. Antimicrobial protection repels 99.9% of bacteria, so you don't need to fret the germs. A built-in smartphone charger and 16 hours of battery make sure you're connected during every adventure. The HydraJolt has a built-in carabineer that can be clipped to a backpack, dufflebag, or beach chair for tunes on the go! Pair two HydraJolts together via True Wireless Pairing for double the sound! Built-in LED light modes will beat, strobe and pulse to the music for added fun.

products.description: Experience crisp, detailed visuals and upgrade your backyard entertainment setup with the 43-inch DuraPro smart outdoor partial sun UHD LED TV. This TV features a beautiful 4K display with HDR and 500-nit brightness for a clearer immersive experience that’s up to 60% brighter than indoor TVs. The DuraPro smart TV is compatible with Wi-Fi and powered by webOS, so you can access news, sports, entertainment and more with ease. Ideal for partially shaded outdoor living areas, such as covered patios and gazebos, the rugged, weatherproof IP54-rated exterior and tempered glass screen provide extra protection against rain, dust, UV rays and more. Includes a waterproof remote bag and compatible TV wall mount for the ultimate streamlined living space design.
